attributes.action: Force supermarkets to package ALL their products in compostable and biodegradable packaging.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently supermarkets package alot of their organic produce in compostable and biodegradable packaging. Unfortuntely this means that those who are not wealthy enough to be able to pay the higher prices for these products are adding to the problem of landfill. We propose that supermarkets should be made legally obliged to package all their products in compostable and biodegradable packaging and also minimise the amount of packaging used on the whole.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Force supermarkets to package ALL their products in compostable and biodegradable packaging."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14111.asp

Prime Minister's Office
